projects.title: Wonderland of the West
projects.description: A simple line-art piece I made as an ode to the city I was born and raised in. Designed with Adobe Illustrator.

projects.title: BeerMe!
projects.description: BeerMe is a forthcoming app for ordering drinks to your seat at any major sports stadium. The client, an iOS developer, had built a fully functional app but had done nothing with the design or branding, using common stock images/elements in place of actual UI components. In desperate need of a visual overhaul, I stepped in and completely reskinned the app, providing the logo, colour palette, illustrations, UX and UI. Designed with Adobe Illustrator and prototyped with Experience Design.

projects.title: Ulti-Mate
projects.description: Product promotional poster for print that was commissioned by Ulti-Mate, a major manufacturer of domestic and industrial cleaning chemicals in the Caribbean. Designed with Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop

projects.title: Shades Of Shadow
projects.description: Album cover artwork commissioned for 'Shades of Shadow', a jazz album by musician Chris Colton. Chris provided me with a high resolution black & white portrait which I painted over in Adobe Illustrator, evoking the rotoscoped style of Richard Linklater films, 'A Scanner Darkly' and 'Waking life'. Designed with Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop.

projects.title: Finding it And Losing It
projects.description: Single cover artwork for 'Finding it and Losing It', an experimental electronic album by jazz duo, RVRSAL. This piece was commissioned for a promotional single which, at the time, was called, 'Refract'. The duo wanted something psychedelic and unnerving; much like the music they create. I drew inspiration from the Christopher Nolan film, 'Inception', as well as the early trailers for Marvel's 'Doctor Strange'. Designed with Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop.

projects.title: Bonjour Hi
projects.description: Official poster of Bonjour Hi, a feature length short film collection about life in Montreal. Each of the four films of Bonjour Hi takes place at different times at iconic locations in the city of Montreal. I used textured gradients to illustrate the passing of time from Morning to Night behind the iconic skyline of the Montreal cityscape. Designed with Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator and InDesign.

projects.title: Volt
projects.description: Marketing and social media banner for Volt, a stungun phone case and corresponding iOS app. The challenge here was to create a highly effective and quirky visual that diverged from typical self-defense marketing which tend to exploit the viewer's fear of kidnapping or assault. Designed with Adobe Illustrator

projects.title: Pacific Gold Agriculture
projects.description: Here's the design I pitched to Pacific Gold Agriculture when they decided to redesign their overall brand and visual identity. Since many of their business partners are from Asia, they wanted a logo that evoked Japanese aesthetic without losing their identity as an agricultural company. Designed with Adobe Illustrator.
